short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud Coloring Book (with Drive) is a fun coloring activity for all ages. Paint on coloring book pages like on real paper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cloud Coloring Book is a fun coloring activity for all ages. It has a variety of bright colors to use and show off your creativity.
Paint on coloring book pages like on real paper.

You can also save the paint image to your computer and Google Drive directly.
This is one app the whole family will be sure to enjoy. 

Provides various images including Pooh, Puppy, Mario, Shrek...and more.
Supports star, love, magic brushes.
Zoom in and Zoom out feature makes it easy to color smaller areas.
Custom Background, You can select your image to paint on coloring book page.
